# lightingModel

**Instance Property**

Modes that describe how materials using created `CustomMaterial.Program` will interact with light within the RealityKit scene.

## Declaration

```swift
var lightingModel: CustomMaterial.LightingModel
```

## Discussion

Default value is true.
